description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ft9ac","text":"This protocol details the purification of proteins from PFA fixed samples and extraction of proteins from formalin-fixed tissues. Also included, biotin pulldown prior to LC-MS/MS. Samples generated for this protocol have been used for mass spectrometry, immunoblotting, and pulldowns.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9kenu","text":"Wash Buffer (1L): 
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63uuc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cqes1","text":"Reversal Buffer (RB) (500ML):
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8i7ri","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4bau0","text":"PMSF solution (100 mM). Acute toxicity, handle powder carefully.
1. Place 1.5mL tube onto scale, tare.
2. Add small amount of PMSF to tube, record weight.
3. Add calculated volume of isopropanol to PMSF. Mix well. To calculate: PMSF mass (mg) / 17.4 = volume of isopropanol.
Stable in isopropanol at RT for at least 6 months. Stable for ~15 min once added to aqueous solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23},{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":40}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"88vpl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ecrjv","text":"Fixation solution: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ikpe","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fgj5e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["144",100],"data":[["10X TBS pH 7.6","100 mL"],["Triton X-100","10 mL"],["SDS","1 g"],["0.5M EDTA pH 8.0","2 mL"]],"guid":"68DD3873144B4A079C47D7E35B3C6D40","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2lk7c","text":"Dissolve in milliq water.
